what: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
title: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
text: Downloads specified ZIP files EPC Open Data API, extracts either certificate recommendation CSV data, saves destination path. Handles authentication, error checking, cleanup temporary files.

title: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
code: odc_bulk_download(   file_name,   destination_path,   type = c("certificate", "recommendation"),   keep_zip = FALSE )

title: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
text: file_name character File name downloaded (extension included) valid file name odc_get_file() odc_get_file_list(). destination_path character Directory path extracted CSV file saved. Directory created exist. type character String specifying data type extract ZIP archive. Must either "certificate" (default) "recommendation". keep_zip logical downloaded ZIP file kept? yes, saved destination_path. Default FALSE (extracted CSV kept).

title: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
text: Invisibly returns NULL. function's primary purpose side effect saving extracted CSV data disk.

title: Download and extract EPC data files from ZIP archives ‚Äî odc_bulk_download
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Download and extract domestic certificate data for London odc_bulk_download(   file_name = "domestic-E08000025.zip",   destination_path = here::here("downloads"),   type = "certificate" )  # Download and keep the ZIP file along with extracted recommendations odc_bulk_download(   file_name = "non_domestic-E08000025.csv.zip",   destination_path = here::here("downloads"),   type = "recommendation",   keep_zip = TRUE ) } # }

Must one : "domestic", "non_domestic", "display". endpoint character Type data retrieve. Must one : "certificate" (full certificate details) "recommendation" (improvement recommendations).

what: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
title: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
text: function allows search energy certificates Open Data Communities API. provides access Domestic, Non-domestic, Display Certificates, full support pagination.

title: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
code: odc_search_data(   type = c("domestic", "non_domestic", "dislay"),   paginate = c("none", "all", "manual"),   max_pages = NULL,   max_records = NULL,   ... )

title: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
text: type character type certificate search . Must one : "domestic": Domestic Energy Performance Certificates (homes) "non_domestic": Non-domestic Energy Performance Certificates (business premises) "display": Display Energy Certificates (public buildings) paginate character Pagination control mode. Must one : "none": Fetch first page results (default, fastest) "": Automatically retrieve available pages "manual": Fetch first page display continuation token manual control max_pages integer NULL. Maximum pages retrieve paginate = "". Useful limiting large queries testing. Ignored modes. max_records integer NULL. Maximum total records retrieve. specified, automatically switches paginate = "" fetches records across multiple pages limit reached. Efficiently adjusts page sizes. ... Search filters passed name-value pairs. Common parameters include: address: character  Address search string (e.g., "Downing Street") postcode: character  UK postcode, full partial (e.g., "SW1A", "SW1A 1AA") local_authority: character Local authority code (e.g., "E09000030") from_date, to_date: character Date range "YYYY-MM" format property_type: character Property type (e.g., "house", "flat") size: integer Page size (1-5000, defaults 25) Note: Parameters hyphens API (local-authority) can written underscores instead (local_authority).

title: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
text: tibble containing certificate records matching search criteria. tibble includes available fields API. Returns empty tibble matches found.

title: Search for Energy Performance Certificates and Display Energy Certificates ‚Äî odc_search_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Basic search for domestic certificates by postcode odc_search_data("domestic", postcode = "SW1A 1AA")  # Search non-domestic certificates with address filter odc_search_data("non_domestic", address = "London", size = 100)  # Search Display Energy Certificates with authority filter odc_search_data("display", local_authority = "E09000030")  # Get exactly 500 records (automatically paginates) odc_search_data("domestic", max_records = 500, postcode = "SW1A")  # Manual pagination control first_page <- odc_search_data("domestic", paginate = "manual",                               address = "Manchester") # Use token from message to get next page manually  # Complex search with multiple filters odc_search_data(   "domestic",   paginate = "all",   max_records = 1000,   postcode = "SW1A",   from_date = "2020-01",   to_date = "2023-12",   property_type = "flat" ) } # }

what: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
text: odc_set_key() stores Open Data Communities username API key environment variable (ODC_API_KEY) use subsequent API calls. credentials combined encoded Base64 required API's HTTP Basic Authentication.

title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
code: odc_set_key(odc_user = NULL, odc_key = NULL, overwrite = FALSE)

title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
text: odc_user character Open Data Communities username (usually email address). NULL, function abort. odc_key character Open Data Communities API key. NULL, function abort. overwrite logical TRUE, overwrite existing ODC_API_KEY environment variable. Defaults FALSE, preventing accidental overwrites.

title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
text: Returns NULL. Called primarily side effect setting environment variable.

title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
text: function needs run per R session, whenever credentials change. key stored ODC_API_KEY environment variable current session. security, recommended hard-code credentials scripts. Consider using function interactively sourcing secure location.

title: Set your Open Data Communities API credentials ‚Äî odc_set_key
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Set your credentials for the first time odc_set_key(   odc_user = "email@example.com",   odc_key = "your_api_key_here" )  # Overwrite existing credentials (if needed) odc_set_key(   odc_user = "email@example.com",   odc_key = "new_api_key",   overwrite = TRUE ) } # }

title: energizer 0.10.0
text: odc_set_key sets Open Data Communities API base64-encoding user-provided credentials. odc_get_data retrieves certificates recommendations domestic, non_domestic display certification types lmk_key attribute. odc_search_data allows users search certificates recommendations domestic, non_domestic display based multiple filtering criteria. odc_get_schema allow retrieval dataset schemas. odc_get_meta returns API metadata, latestDate updateData. odc_bulk_download can used bulk download available files, can retrieved either via odc_get_file_list() odc_get_list().
